pullrequest.title: Quick fix for config errors after qtutils 2 changes

content.raw:
By the way, if you're actually running with Qt5 in the lab (which it seem you probably are, if this bug bit you?), you're probably likely to hit problems with the drag-drop tabs in BLACS, which seem to be not very happy in Qt5. Perhaps you could test the new dragdroptabs? My fork is a mess so if you pull from be sure to do `hg pull --branch dragdroptab #!/cbillington/labscript_utils` to just get the relevant branch.

Edit: once I resolve the merge conflicts.
content.html:
By the way, if you're actually running with Qt5 in the lab (which it seem you probably are, if this bug bit you?), you're probably likely to hit problems with the drag-drop tabs in BLACS, which seem to be not very happy in Qt5. Perhaps you could test the new dragdroptabs? My fork is a mess so if you pull from be sure to do hg pull --branch dragdroptab #!/cbillington/labscript_utils to just get the relevant branch.
